levels.name: Level 1
levels.description: Possesses basic knowledge and skills related to some elements of the competency and is able to apply them with moderate supervision

levels.name: Level 2
levels.description: Able to demonstrate knowledge and skills related to most of the elements of the competency and apply them without need for constant supervision

levels.name: Level 3
levels.description: Possesses strong knowledge and skills required for the competency and demonstrates an understanding of the interlinkages between competencies. Acts as an advisor on the topic, often producing manuals/notes to support colleagues.

levels.name: Level 4
levels.description: Demonstrates excellence in all capabilities related to the competency compared to best industry benchmarks within the country. Is a person of authority on  practices and/or systems related to the competency and is widely consulted on the same.

levels.name: Level 5
levels.description: Demonstrates complete mastery of the competency and use of it in unprecedented ways. Has a fundamental, outsized impact on their field of knowledge with few other people having similar capabilities.
